name: Call Of Unity
description:
Soldier Unity prepare for battle! Grab a weapon from the arsenal and go conquer Unity's battlefields!

On the battlefields of Unity 4 types of war await you! Deathmatch, Domination, Team Deathmatch and Gun Game are available!
Choose your fighting style FAL, Sniper, Shotgun.... Become an expert in your class!

Soldier Unity, don't disappoint me!



Features :

■ Choice between 4 game modes!
■ 7 different weapons and grenades!
■ 3 different maps!
■ Play multiplayer !
■ AI !
■ Addictive!
